EmailTemplate.description: To notify community members that their registration has been approved.
EmailTemplate.name: Community Member Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Community Member Registration is Approved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
[Image alt text: RiseTogetherLogo] < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/RiseTogetherPortal > Hello {{{Community_Member__c.Last_Name__c}}},
Congratulations!We are pleased to inform you that your registration as a Community Member has been successfully{{{Community_Member__c.Approval_Status__c}}}!
Here is your status overview :
Approval Status: {{{Community_Member__c.Approval_Status__c}}}
Membership Status : {{{Community_Member__c.Member_Status__c}}}
Thank you for Joining!!
If you have any questions or need assistance, please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out to us.
Warm Regards
Rise Together
